message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds immense value, potentially worth much more than $1000000. While I can't disclose all details, I'm confident this product could be a game-changer for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000, a price that reflects its potential.  Consider this a chance to acquire something truly special. Let me know your thoughts.
